title: “You’ve Got a Work Friend” - James Taylor and Stephen Colbert
description:
During James Taylor’s weeklong Late Show residency, Stephen stopped by his dressing room unannounced, only to find him working on an updated version of his timeless hit, “You’ve Got a Friend.”
